content: b'You met cool people but not cool enough to remember them?'

b"That's how nature works

People that you don't remember you probably should forget

Your brain knows what it's doing

Millions of years of evolution"

b'They all read that book "how to win friends and influence people"

Anyway one guy in uni would come to me and ask me about my drum & bass night I played at months ago, I realized there was no way he could remember that because we were vague acquintances, turns out he had a personal CRM of ALL the students and would keep notes on everyone

Another guy I knew as digital nomad did the same, he'd log creepy details about you from things you said in personal conversations

None of these two people got anywhere btw, both were quite high IQ though

Point is treating people like database entries is the least personal thing you can ever do and is actually how you NOT make friends and NOT influence people

Sociopaths'
b'Every person I met who had a Personal CRM turned out to be a sociopath/psychopath over a timeline of 10 years'

b"People said this when I did 12 startups in 12 months in 2014

That it wasn't startups, and that I wasn't a founder

All those definitions are just gatekeeping bs"

b"Every AI founder I see now is 17 years old

I don't know what's happening

Good to see they're shipping early"

b'In San Francisco city I got recognized 5 times per day, and then at the airport 5 times per hour

One guy tweet sniped me!

Fun to meet all the ppl though, everyone has an interesting story

If we have 10x more followers though this would be 50 times per hour making it unliveable'

b'\xe2\x9c\xa8 One benefit of Flux coming out was that hands were finally fixed

So I can now finally make an \xf0\x9f\x92\x85 AI Nail Generator

Nice for nail salons and designers to prototype nail ideas for customers before they actually paint them

It has lots of preset nails already, but you can also just describe the nails you want to see and it will generate realistic photos of them

Here I asked it to make a \xf0\x9f\x8f\x9d\xef\xb8\x8f \xf0\x9f\x92\xbb digital nomad nail design, some \xf0\x9f\x8c\x8a Van Gogh nails and \xf0\x9f\x8c\xb8 cherry blossom nails

Link in reply'
